song_analysis.title: Lofi Study Session
song_analysis.character_description: A young woman with long, flowing auburn hair and vintage, oversized sweater and jeans, sits at a desk.

scenes.scene_setting: Cozy bedroom, bathed in the warm glow of a sunset. Bookshelves line the walls, filled with well-worn paperbacks. A vintage record player sits in the corner.
scenes.video_prompt: A young woman sits at a desk, illuminated by the warm light of a sunset filtering through the window. She's writing in a journal, occasionally pausing to sip from a steaming mug. Dust motes dance in the sunbeams. Close-up on her hand as she turns a page, revealing sketches and handwritten notes. The camera slowly pans across the room, revealing details like a half-finished drawing, a stack of records, and a sleeping cat curled up on a windowsill. The warm colors and soft lighting evoke a feeling of nostalgia and peaceful creativity. The video should loop seamlessly.
scenes.image_prompt: Close-up shot of a young woman's hand writing in a journal by the warm light of a sunset in a cozy bedroom, filled with books and records. Dust motes dance in the sunbeams, vintage record player in the background. In the style of Edward Hopper.
scenes.scene_description: The opening scene establishes the character and her environment. It focuses on the simple act of writing and the peaceful atmosphere of her room.

scenes.scene_setting: Rainy city street at night, viewed through a window.
scenes.video_prompt: The camera focuses on raindrops racing down a windowpane. A blurry cityscape is visible in the background, with neon lights reflecting off the wet streets. The scene alternates between close-ups of the water droplets and wider shots of the city lights. Inside, the young woman is silhouetted against the window, lost in thought. Her face is obscured by shadows. She drums her fingers on the window sill. The scene has a melancholic and introspective mood.
scenes.image_prompt: Raindrops racing down a windowpane at night, blurry cityscape with neon lights reflecting off wet streets in the background, silhouette of a young woman standing by the window, lost in thought, melancholic mood. In the style of Edward Hopper.
scenes.scene_description: This scene introduces a sense of isolation and introspection, contrasting the cozy interior with the bustling city outside.
scenes.action: Watching the rain, drumming fingers, lost in thought.

scenes.scene_setting: The same cozy bedroom from Scene 1, but now it's night. The only light source is a desk lamp.
scenes.video_prompt: The woman is now working on a computer, illuminated by the soft glow of a desk lamp. She is wearing headphones. Code scrolls on the screen. Close-up on her face shows concentration and determination. Quick cuts to her hands typing, lines of code, and a steaming mug of coffee. The scene has a focused and productive atmosphere. The camera slowly zooms out, revealing more of the room and emphasizing the feeling of being absorbed in work.
scenes.image_prompt: Young woman working on a computer in a cozy bedroom at night, illuminated by the soft glow of a desk lamp, headphones on, focused expression, coding on screen, in the style of Edward Hopper.
scenes.scene_description: This scene shows the character engaged in a different creative activity, highlighting her focus and dedication.
scenes.action: Coding, typing, listening to music, drinking coffee.
